desc: Contemporary Persian Jewels, Gifts, Lifestyle and Decoration Concept Store. Jewellery: necklaces, earrings, bracelets.. Style: Oriental, Persian, Middle Eastern, Iranian. Handmade, fair-trade. Made in France Bijoux, boucles d'oreille, colliers, France, Geneva

layout.text: Enter Yalda to discover a world of refined oriental aesthetics. Yalda's products are enriched by a Persian soul, yet have a resolute contemporary spirit.
